description: Lists all Failback ReplicationConfigurations, filtered by Recovery Instance ID.

parameters.name: recoveryInstanceID
parameters.description: The ID of the Recovery Instance whose failback replication configuration should be returned.

nested_items.name: bandwidthThrottling
nested_items.description: Configure bandwidth throttling for the outbound data transfer rate of the Recovery Instance in Mbps.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Failback Replication Configuration.

nested_items.name: recoveryInstanceID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: usePrivateIP
nested_items.description: Whether to use Private IP for the failback replication of the Recovery Instance.
